 120@app.before_request
 121def check_for_maintenance():
 122    """
 123    decorator to manage the maintenance mode trigger by function maintenance_on() and maintenance_off().
 124    """
 125    if maintenance_mode.get_mode() is True and request.path != url_for('maintenance') and request.path != url_for('maintenance_on') and request.path != url_for('maintenance_off') and request.path != url_for('network_maintenance_on') and request.path != url_for('network_maintenance_off') and request.path != url_for('validate_block') and request.path != url_for('start') and request.path != url_for('block_saving_leader_node'):   
 126        return redirect(url_for('maintenance'))

 159@app.route("/transactions", methods=['POST'])
 160def validate_transaction():
 161    """
 162    receive a transaction by non leader node and routes it to leader node.
 163    """
 164    logging.info("New transaction validation request")
 165    content = request.json
 166    content=clean_request(content)
 167    blockchain_memory = BlockchainMemory()
 168    blockchain_base = blockchain_memory.get_blockchain_from_memory()
 169    try:
 170        transaction = Transaction(blockchain_base, MY_HOSTNAME)
 171        transaction.receive(transaction=content["transaction"])
 172        if transaction.validate_output_not_empty() == True:transaction.broadcast_to_leader_node()
 173        else:logging.info("###ERROR: transaction output is empty")
 174    except TransactionException as transaction_exception:
 175        return f'{transaction_exception}', 400
 176    return "Transaction success", 200

 180@app.route("/transactions_to_leader_node", methods=['POST'])
 181def transactions_to_leader_node():
 182    """
 183    validate and save in a temporay master state called TempBlockPoH a transaction received by leader node only.
 184    FYI, the transactions are stored in the blockchain and final master state during block receiving 
 185    by function validate_block or block_saving_leader_node.
 186    """
 187    logging.info("New transaction to leader node request")
 188    content = request.json
 189    #logging.info(f"content: {content}")
 190    logging.info(f"Transaction: {content['transaction']}")
 191    #Launch of Multiprocessing to handle the volume of transaction
 192    transaction_multiprocessing=TransactionMultiProcessing()
 193    transaction_multiprocessing.launch(content['transaction'],False)
 194    
 195    return "Transaction success", 200
 196
 197class TransactionMultiProcessing:
 198    """
 199    Class to process several transactions in parallel triggered by function transactions_to_leader_node.
 200    """
 201    def __init__(self,*args, **kwargs):
 202        self.e = threading.Event()
 203
 204    def launch(self,transaction_data,new_transaction_flag):
 205        self.PoH_threading = threading.Thread(target=self.start, args=(self.e,transaction_data,new_transaction_flag))
 206        self.PoH_threading.start()
 207        #self.PoH_threading.join()
 208
 209    def start(self,e,transaction_data,new_transaction_flag):
 210        new_public_key_hash=Owner().public_key_hash
 211        while e.is_set() is False:
 212            Process_transaction(transaction_data=transaction_data,new_transaction_flag=new_transaction_flag,new_public_key_hash=new_public_key_hash)
 213            logging.info('===> TransactionMultiProcessing termination')
 214            self.stop()
 215            break
 216
 217    def stop(self):
 218        self.e.set()
 219

 222def Process_transaction(*args, **kwargs):
 223    """
 224    sub function of Class TransactionMultiProcessing 
 225    to process in parallel the transactions received by the leader node.
 226    """
 227    purge_flag = kwargs.get('purge_flag',False)
 228    transaction_data = kwargs.get('transaction_data',True)
 229    new_transaction_flag = kwargs.get('new_transaction_flag',False)
 230    new_public_key_hash = kwargs.get('new_public_key_hash',False)
 231    #logging.info(f"### purge_flag:{purge_flag}")
 232    
 233    #STEP2 Processing of transaction
 234    blockchain_base = blockchain_memory.get_blockchain_from_memory()
 235    previous_PoH_hash=blockchain_base.block_header.current_PoH_hash
 236    previous_PoH_timestamp=blockchain_base.block_header.current_PoH_timestamp
 237    #check if it's the first new transaction
 238    #logging.info(f"{previous_PoH_hash!=PoH_memory.previous_PoH_hash} previous_PoH_hash: {previous_PoH_hash} PoH_memory.previous_PoH_hash:{PoH_memory.previous_PoH_hash}")
 239    leader_node_schedule=LeaderNodeScheduleMemory()
 240    #logging.info(f"### current_leader_node_url:{leader_node_schedule.current_leader_node_url} MY_HOSTNAME:{MY_HOSTNAME} PoH_memory.PoH_start_flag:{PoH_memory.PoH_start_flag==False}")
 241    #check_test="BlockVote" not in str(transaction_data)
 242    #logging.info(f"### PoH_memory.PoH_start_flag:{PoH_memory.PoH_start_flag}")
 243    #logging.info(f"### check_test:{check_test}")
 244    #logging.info(f"### transaction_data:{transaction_data}")
 245    if leader_node_schedule.current_leader_node_url==MY_HOSTNAME:leader_node_flag=True
 246    else:leader_node_flag=False
 247    #logging.info(f"### purge_flag:{purge_flag}")
 248    logging.info(f"### leader_node_flag:{leader_node_flag}")
 249    
 250
 251
 252    if leader_node_flag is True:
 253        #if PoH_memory.PoH_start_flag==False:
 254       
 255        if PoH_memory.PoH_start_flag==False and "NIGthreading" not in str(transaction_data):
 256        #if leader_node_schedule.current_leader_node_url==MY_HOSTNAME and PoH_memory.PoH_start_flag==False:
 257            #this is the first transaction of the SLOT, 
 258            #or there is the new LeaderNode following a block assertion error
 259            # and this is not only a BlockVote to avoid infinite loop for creating Block
 260            #let's start PoH
 261            #PoH_memory.reset(previous_PoH_hash,previous_PoH_timestamp)
 262            previous_previous_PoH_hash=PoH_memory.previous_PoH_hash
 263            PoH_memory.reset(previous_previous_PoH_hash,previous_PoH_hash,datetime.timestamp(datetime.utcnow()))
 264            PoH_memory.launch_PoH()
 265            logging.info(f"Launch of PoH: {previous_PoH_hash}")
 266
 267        #check if the PoH is terminated to avoid being blocked
 268        if PoH_memory.PoH_start_flag==True and purge_flag is False:
 269            #logging.info(f"==>PoH_memory.previous_PoH_timestamp: {PoH_memory.previous_PoH_timestamp}")
 270            PoH_memory.check_termination()
 271
 272        if purge_flag is False and PoH_memory.wip_flag is False:
 273            logging.info("Saving of transaction in advance by leader node")
 274            save_transactions_to_leader_node_advance(transaction_data)
 275        else:
 276            try:
 277                transaction = Transaction(blockchain_base, MY_HOSTNAME)
 278                transaction.receive(transaction=transaction_data)
 279                if transaction.is_new:
 280                    logging.info("Transaction is new")
 281
 282                    #let's block MasterState
 283                    while master_state_readiness.block() is False:
 284                        #let's wait until MasterState is release by another thread
 285                        pass
 286                    #logging.info(f"###Transaction is locked: {transaction.transaction_data}")
 287                    
 288                    smart_contract_flag,smart_contract_index_list=check_smart_contract(transaction)
 289            
 290                    if smart_contract_flag:
 291                        #there are smart contract in the transaction, let's validate them
 292                        #input UTXO can be change so transaction_validation.validate() can only happen after 
 293                        transaction.validate_smart_contract(smart_contract_index_list,leader_node_flag=leader_node_flag)
 294
 295                    transaction.validate(NIGthreading_flag=True)
 296                    transaction.validate_funds(NIGthreading_flag=True)
 297
 298                    #if transaction.is_valid is True and transaction.is_smart_contract_valid is True or leader_node_flag is False and "BlockVote" not in str(transaction_data):
 299                    if transaction.is_valid is True and transaction.is_smart_contract_valid is True:
 300                        
 301                        #storing in a temporay master state
 302                        master_state_temp=MasterState(temporary_save_flag=True)
 303                        if check_marketplace_step1_buy(transaction.outputs,check_user_flag=False) is True:
 304                            #this is a marketplace step 1, meaning a buy request, let's add a carriage transaction to increase performance
 305                            add_carriage_transaction("buy",transaction,new_public_key_hash,blockchain_base,master_state_temp)
 306
 307                        if check_marketplace_step1_sell(transaction.outputs,check_user_flag=False) is True:
 308                            #this is a marketplace step -1,meaning a sell request, let's add a carriage transaction to increase performance
 309                            add_carriage_transaction("sell",transaction,new_public_key_hash,blockchain_base,master_state_temp)
 310    
 311                        if check_marketplace_raw(transaction.outputs,15) is True or check_marketplace_raw(transaction.outputs,2) is True or check_marketplace_raw(transaction.outputs,98) is True or check_marketplace_raw(transaction.outputs,99) is True:
 312                            #the carriage transaction needs to be deleted
 313                            logging.info("###INFO CARRIAGE cancellation request")
 314                            delete_carriage_transaction(transaction,blockchain_base,master_state_temp)
 315                            
 316                        #update of transaction_data as smart_contract_previous_transaction has changed
 317                        transaction.transaction_data["outputs"]=transaction.outputs
 318                        transaction.transaction_data["inputs"]=transaction.inputs
 319                        logging.info(f"==>block_PoH:TempBlockPoH")
 320                        try:
 321                            master_state_temp.update_master_state(transaction.transaction_data,"TempBlockPoH",leader_node_flag=leader_node_flag,NIGthreading_flag=True)
 322                            master_state_temp.store_master_state_in_memory("TempBlockPoH")
 323                        except Exception as e:
 324                            #issue with the SmartContract
 325                            transaction.is_smart_contract_valid=False
 326                            logging.info(f"ERROR with update_master_state of SmartContract  Exception: {e}")
 327                            logging.exception(e)
 328
 329                    if transaction.is_smart_contract_valid is True:
 330                        logging.info("###INFO transaction in memory")
 331                        data=transaction.transaction_data["outputs"]
 332                        logging.info(f"###INFO transaction:{data}")
 333                        transaction.store()
 334                        transaction.add_to_PoH(PoH_memory)
 335            
 336                        logging.info(f"PoH_memory: {PoH_memory.registry_input_data}")
 337
 338                    #let's release MasterState
 339                    master_state_readiness.release()
 340                    #logging.info(f"###Transaction is released: {transaction.transaction_data}")
 341      
 342            except TransactionException as transaction_exception:
 343                return f'{transaction_exception}', 400
 344

 346def add_carriage_transaction(action,transaction,new_public_key_hash,blockchain_base,master_state_temp):
 347    #this is a marketplace step 1 (buy request) or -1 (sell request) transaction, let's add a carriage transaction to increase performance
 348    
 349    #Step 1 : retrieve the needed information of the marketplace step 1 request
 350    master_state=MasterState()
 351    mp_account_data=None
 352    requested_amount=None
 353    requested_gap=0
 354    for utxo in transaction.outputs:
 355        account_list_temp=master_state.extract_account_list_from_locking_script("OP_SC",utxo)
 356        #check to avoid issue
 357        #for step 0 there is only 1 UTXO
 358        #for step 1 there is more than 1 UTXO so we keep only 
 359        #the one where account_list has more than 1 item to avoid issue
 360        #with deposit transaction where there is only one account_list
 361        if len(account_list_temp)>1 or len(transaction.outputs)==1:
 362            account_list=account_list_temp
 363            try:
 364                payload=utxo['smart_contract_payload']+f'''
 365return mp_request_step2_done.get_mp_info(1,None)
 366'''
 367                smart_contract=SmartContract(account_list[0],
 368                                                smart_contract_sender='sender_public_key_hash',
 369                                                smart_contract_type="source",
 370                                                smart_contract_new=True,
 371                                                payload=payload)
 372                smart_contract.process()
 373                locals()['smart_contract']
 374                if smart_contract.result is not None :mp_account_data=smart_contract.result
 375                if mp_account_data is not None:
 376                    requested_amount=mp_account_data['requested_amount']
 377                    requested_gap=mp_account_data['requested_gap']
 378            except Exception as e:
 379                logging.info(f"### ISSUE master_state get mp_account_data account:{account_list[0]} {e}")
 380                logging.exception(e)
 381
 382    #Step 2 : retrieve the right MP account
 383    
 384
 385    if action=="buy":mp_account,mp_amount,mp_gap,next_mp,sc,last_flag=master_state.get_buy_mp_account_from_memory(requested_gap)
 386    if action=="sell":mp_account,mp_amount,mp_gap,next_mp,sc,last_flag=master_state.get_sell_mp_account_from_memory(requested_gap)
 387    if last_flag is True:
 388        #first transaction of the list
 389        #OR last transaction of the list
 390        #there is no Need to update a previous carriage request
 391        next_mp_account=new_public_key_hash
 392        carriage_transaction_list=[{"mp_account":mp_account,
 393                                    "requested_amount":requested_amount,
 394                                    "requested_gap":requested_gap,
 395                                    "sc_account":account_list[0],
 396                                    "next_mp_account":next_mp_account}]
 397    else:
 398        #transaction in the middle of the list
 399        #current carriage transaction and previous need to be updated
 400        new_mp_account=new_public_key_hash
 401        carriage_transaction_list=[{"mp_account":mp_account,
 402                                    "requested_amount":requested_amount,
 403                                    "requested_gap":requested_gap,
 404                                    "sc_account":account_list[0],
 405                                    "next_mp_account":new_mp_account},
 406                                    {"mp_account":new_mp_account,
 407                                    "requested_amount":mp_amount,
 408                                    "requested_gap":mp_gap,
 409                                    "sc_account":sc,
 410                                    "next_mp_account":next_mp}]
 411    for carriage_item in carriage_transaction_list:
 412        carriage_item_mp_account=carriage_item["mp_account"]
 413        carriage_item_requested_amount=carriage_item["requested_amount"]
 414        carriage_item_requested_gap=carriage_item["requested_gap"]
 415        carriage_item_sc_account=carriage_item["sc_account"]
 416        carriage_item_next_mp_account=carriage_item["next_mp_account"]
 417                                
 418        carriage_transaction=get_carriage_transaction(carriage_item_mp_account,carriage_item_requested_amount,carriage_item_requested_gap,carriage_item_sc_account,carriage_item_next_mp_account)
 419                            
 420        #update of temporay master state and storage with the carriage_transaction
 421        carriage_transaction_2_save = Transaction(blockchain_base, MY_HOSTNAME)
 422        carriage_transaction_2_save.receive(transaction=carriage_transaction.transaction_data)
 423        carriage_transaction_2_save.is_funds_sufficient=True
 424        carriage_transaction_2_save.is_valid=True
 425                            
 426        try:
 427            master_state_temp.update_master_state(carriage_transaction.transaction_data,"TempBlockPoH",leader_node_flag=True,NIGthreading_flag=True)
 428            master_state_temp.store_master_state_in_memory("TempBlockPoH")
 429            carriage_transaction_2_save.store()
 430            carriage_transaction_2_save.add_to_PoH(PoH_memory)
 431        except Exception as e:
 432            #issue with the SmartContract
 433            #carriage_transaction.is_smart_contract_valid=False
 434            logging.info(f"ERROR with update_master_state of carriage_transaction Exception: {e}")
 435            logging.exception(e)
 436                            
 437
 438def delete_carriage_transaction(transaction,blockchain_base,master_state_temp):
 439    master_state=MasterState()
 440    for utxo in transaction.outputs:
 441        account_list=master_state.extract_account_list_from_locking_script("OP_SC",utxo)
 442        from common.utils import get_carriage_transaction_to_delete
 443        carriage_transaction_list=get_carriage_transaction_to_delete(account_list[0])
 444        for carriage_transaction in carriage_transaction_list:
 445            #update of temporay master state and storage with the carriage_transaction
 446            carriage_transaction_2_save = Transaction(blockchain_base, MY_HOSTNAME)
 447            carriage_transaction_2_save.receive(transaction=carriage_transaction.transaction_data)
 448            carriage_transaction_2_save.is_funds_sufficient=True
 449            carriage_transaction_2_save.is_valid=True
 450                            
 451            try:
 452                master_state_temp.update_master_state(carriage_transaction.transaction_data,"TempBlockPoH",leader_node_flag=True,NIGthreading_flag=True)
 453                master_state_temp.store_master_state_in_memory("TempBlockPoH")
 454                carriage_transaction_2_save.store()
 455                carriage_transaction_2_save.add_to_PoH(PoH_memory)
 456            except Exception as e:
 457                #issue with the SmartContract
 458                #carriage_transaction.is_smart_contract_valid=False
 459                logging.info(f"ERROR with update_master_state of carriage_transaction Exception: {e}")
 460                logging.exception(e)

 463def leader_node_advance_purge_backlog():
 464    """
 465    purge the potential backlog of transaction during leader note rotation.
 466    """
 467    logging.info(f"### leader_node_advance_purge_backlog")
 468    backlog_list=[]
 469    import os
 470    if not os.path.exists(STORAGE_DIR+LEADER_NODE_TRANSACTIONS_ADVANCE):
 471        #the directory is not existing, let's create it
 472        os.makedirs(STORAGE_DIR+LEADER_NODE_TRANSACTIONS_ADVANCE)
 473    blockchain_memory = BlockchainMemory()
 474    blockchain_base = blockchain_memory.get_blockchain_from_memory()
 475    
 476    directory = os.fsencode(STORAGE_DIR+LEADER_NODE_TRANSACTIONS_ADVANCE)
 477    #files = filter(os.path.isfile, os.listdir(directory))
 478    #files = [os.path.join(directory, f) for f in files] # add path to each file
 479    #files.sort(key=lambda x: os.path.getmtime(x))
 480    #for file in files:
 481    for file in os.listdir(directory):
 482         filename = os.fsdecode(file)
 483         #the filename is the transaction hash
 484         if blockchain_base.get_transaction(filename)=={}:
 485             logging.info(f"==> transaction in advance UNKNOWN !!!!! :{filename}")
 486             #The transaction is unkown in the blockchain, weed to add it
 487             transaction_filename=STORAGE_DIR+LEADER_NODE_TRANSACTIONS_ADVANCE+f"/{filename.lower()}".replace("'","")
 488             with open(transaction_filename, "rb") as file_obj:
 489                transaction_str = file_obj.read()
 490                transaction_data = json.loads(transaction_str)
 491                backlog_list.append(transaction_data)
 492         else:
 493            logging.info(f"==> transaction in advance known: {filename}")
 494    
 495    #sorting of Backlog by timestamp
 496    backlog_list_sorted=sorted(backlog_list, key=itemgetter('timestamp'))
 497    for backlog_transaction in backlog_list_sorted:
 498        new_public_key_hash=Owner().public_key_hash
 499        Process_transaction(purge_flag=True,transaction_data=backlog_transaction,new_public_key_hash=new_public_key_hash)
 500    
 501    #let's clean all the file of the folder
 502    import os, glob
 503 
 504    dir = STORAGE_DIR+LEADER_NODE_TRANSACTIONS_ADVANCE
 505    filelist = glob.glob(os.path.join(dir, "*"))
 506    for f in filelist:
 507        os.remove(f)
 508
 509

 523def save_transactions_to_leader_node_advance(transaction):
 524    """
 525    sub function of transactions_to_leader_node_advance().
 526    (this function is not used).
 527    """
 528    try:
 529        transaction_hash=transaction['transaction_hash']
 530        if not os.path.exists(STORAGE_DIR+LEADER_NODE_TRANSACTIONS_ADVANCE):
 531            #the directory is not existing, let's create it
 532            os.makedirs(STORAGE_DIR+LEADER_NODE_TRANSACTIONS_ADVANCE)
 533            
 534        transaction_filename=STORAGE_DIR+LEADER_NODE_TRANSACTIONS_ADVANCE+f"/{transaction_hash.lower()}".replace("'","")
 535        transaction_data = json.dumps(transaction).encode("utf-8")
 536        with open(transaction_filename, "wb") as file_obj:
 537            file_obj.write(transaction_data)
 538        
 539    except TransactionException as transaction_exception:
 540        return f'{transaction_exception}', 400

 544@app.route("/block_saving_leader_node", methods=['POST'])
 545def block_saving_leader_node():
 546    """
 547    validate and save a received block in the blockchain and master state by a node which is leader.
 548    """
 549    content = request.json
 550    #fix for boolean
 551    content=clean_request(content)
 552    block_pointer=content['block']['header']['previous_PoH_hash']
 553    blockchain_memory = BlockchainMemory()
 554    blockchain_base = blockchain_memory.get_blockchain_from_memory(block_pointer=block_pointer)
 555    try:
 556        while master_state_readiness.block() is False:
 557            #let's wait until MasterState is release by another thread
 558            pass
 559        
 560        block = NewBlock(blockchain_base, MY_HOSTNAME)
 561        block.receive(new_block=content["block"], sender=content["sender"])
 562        block.add_in_backlog(master_state_readiness)
 563        block.validate(master_state_readiness)
 564
 565        if block.is_valid is False:
 566            #no need to wait for the BlockVote. A branch needs to be created in the consensus_blockchain
 567            block_to_reject_now_by_leader_node=block.new_block.block_header.current_PoH_hash
 568        else:block_to_reject_now_by_leader_node=None
 569        
 570        #refresh of the consensus blockchain
 571        from common.consensus_blockchain import consensus_blockchain
 572        consensus_blockchain.refresh(block_to_reject_now_by_leader_node=block_to_reject_now_by_leader_node)
 573
 574        latest_received_block=block.new_block.block_header.current_PoH_hash
 575        if block.is_valid is True:
 576            #the Block is valid
 577            #leader_node_advance_purge_backlog()
 578            block.clear_block_transactions_from_mempool()
 579            received_block_2_slash=None
 580
 581            #let's refresh the score of the contest if needed
 582            if 5==6:
 583                block.refresh_score_list
 584                for participant_public_key_hash in block.refresh_score_list:
 585                    if backlog_score_processing.check_request(participant_public_key_hash) is False:
 586                        participant_refresh_score_processing=ParticipantRefreshScoreProcessing()
 587                        participant_refresh_score_processing.launch(participant_public_key_hash)
 588
 589        else:
 590            #the Block is not valid
 591            received_block_2_slash=block.new_block.block_header.current_PoH_hash
 592        block.check_vote_and_backlog(master_state_readiness,
 593                                     leader_node_flag=True,
 594                                     latest_received_block=latest_received_block,
 595                                     received_block_2_slash=received_block_2_slash,
 596                                     new_block_2_exclude=latest_received_block)
 597        
 598    #except (NewBlockException, TransactionException) as new_block_exception:
 599    #    return f'{new_block_exception}', 400
 600
 601    except Exception as e:
 602        #issue with new block creation / Miner
 603        logging.info(f"###ERROR block_saving_leader_node issue: {e}")
 604        logging.exception(e)
 605
 606    #let's release MasterState
 607    master_state_readiness.release()
 608
 609    #let's release to allow the block receiving
 610    master_state_threading.receiving_reset()
 611
 612    return "Transaction success", 200
 613

 615@app.route("/block", methods=['POST'])
 616def validate_block():
 617    """
 618    validate and save a received block in the blockchain and master state by a node which is NOT leader.
 619    """
 620    content = request.json
 621    #fix for boolean
 622    content=clean_request(content)
 623    block_multiprocessing=BlockMultiProcessing()
 624    block_multiprocessing.launch(content)
 625    return "Transaction success", 200
 626
 627
 628class BlockMultiProcessing:
 629    """
 630    Class to process several blocks in parallel triggered by function validate_block.
 631    """
 632    def __init__(self,*args, **kwargs):
 633        self.e = threading.Event()
 634
 635    def launch(self,block_data):
 636        self.PoH_threading = threading.Thread(target=self.start, args=(self.e,block_data))
 637        self.PoH_threading.start()
 638        #self.PoH_threading.join()
 639
 640    def start(self,e,block_data):
 641        while e.is_set() is False:
 642            Process_block(block_data=block_data)
 643            logging.info('===> BlockMultiProcessing termination')
 644            self.stop()
 645            break
 646
 647    def stop(self):
 648        self.e.set()
 649
 650
 651def Process_block(*args, **kwargs):
 652    """
 653    sub function of Class BlockMultiProcessing 
 654    to process in parallel the blocks received by a node which is not leader.
 655    """
 656    block_data = kwargs.get('block_data',True)
 657    block_pointer=block_data['block']['header']['previous_PoH_hash']
 658    block_PoH=block_data['block']['header']['current_PoH_hash']
 659    logging.info(f"===> BlockReceiving PoH_hash:{block_PoH}")
 660    #logging.info(f"===> master_state_threading.receiving_readiness_flag:{master_state_threading.receiving_readiness_flag}")
 661    #logging.info(f"===> master_state_readiness.block():{master_state_readiness.block()}")
 662
 663    leader_node_schedule=LeaderNodeScheduleMemory()
 664    if leader_node_schedule.current_leader_node_url==MY_HOSTNAME:leader_node_flag=True
 665    else:leader_node_flag=False
 666    
 667    
 668    #for leader node only
 669    #ensure that the block is allowed to be received (not purge nor block under creation)
 670    #while master_state_threading.receiving_readiness_flag is False:
 671    #    pass
 672
 673    if leader_node_flag is True:
 674        #ensure that a block will be not created during the receiving of Block
 675        master_state_threading.receiving_block()
 676    blockchain_memory = BlockchainMemory()
 677    blockchain_base = blockchain_memory.get_blockchain_from_memory(block_pointer=block_pointer)
 678
 679    try:
 680        while master_state_readiness.block() is False:
 681           #let's wait until MasterState is release by another thread
 682           pass
 683
 684        block = NewBlock(blockchain_base, MY_HOSTNAME)
 685        block.receive(new_block=block_data["block"], sender=block_data["sender"])
 686        block.add_in_backlog(master_state_readiness)
 687        block.validate(master_state_readiness)
 688        
 689        if block.is_valid is False and leader_node_flag is True:
 690            #no need to wait for the BlockVote. A branch needs to be created in the consensus_blockchain
 691            block_to_reject_now_by_leader_node=block.new_block.block_header.current_PoH_hash
 692        else:block_to_reject_now_by_leader_node=None
 693        
 694        #refresh of the consensus blockchain
 695        from common.consensus_blockchain import consensus_blockchain
 696        consensus_blockchain.refresh(block_to_reject_now_by_leader_node=block_to_reject_now_by_leader_node)
 697        
 698        latest_received_block=block.new_block.block_header.current_PoH_hash
 699        if block.is_valid is True:
 700            #the Block is valid
 701            #leader_node_advance_purge_backlog()
 702            block.clear_block_transactions_from_mempool()
 703            received_block_2_slash=None
 704        else:
 705            #the Block is not valid
 706            received_block_2_slash=block.new_block.block_header.current_PoH_hash
 707
 708        block.check_vote_and_backlog(master_state_readiness,
 709                                     latest_received_block=latest_received_block,
 710                                     received_block_2_slash=received_block_2_slash)
 711        
 712        if leader_node_flag is True:
 713            #for leader node only
 714            #let's aknowledge the block receiving to allow the purge of the backlog and the block creation
 715            master_state_threading.receiving_akn()
 716
 717        else:
 718            master_state_threading.receiving_reset()
 719       
 720    #except (NewBlockException, TransactionException) as new_block_exception:
 721    #    return f'{new_block_exception}', 400
 722
 723    except Exception as e:
 724        #issue with new block creation / Miner
 725        master_state_threading.receiving_reset()
 726        logging.info(f"###ERROR block_saving issue: {e}")
 727        logging.exception(e)
 728
 729    #let's release MasterState
 730    master_state_readiness.release()
 731    
 732
 733
 734

 821def network_maintenance(mode):
 822    """
 823    sub function of network_maintenance_on() and network_maintenance_off().
 824    """
 825    known_nodes_memory=KnownNodesMemory()
 826    known_nodes_memory.known_nodes
 827    node_list = known_nodes_memory.known_nodes
 828    new_node_list=[]
 829    for node in node_list:
 830        new_node_list.append(node)
 831    my_node = Node(MY_HOSTNAME)
 832    for node in new_node_list:
 833        if node!= my_node:
 834            try:
 835                if mode=="off":node.network_maintenance_off()
 836                if mode=="on":node.network_maintenance_on()
 837            except Exception as e:
 838                logging.info(f"**** ISSUE network_maintenance {mode}: {node.dict}")
 839                logging.exception(e)
 840
 841    if mode=="off":maintenance_mode.switch_off()
 842    if mode=="on":maintenance_mode.switch_on()
 843

 865def get_utxo(public_key_hash, *args, **kwargs):
 866    """
 867    retrieve all the available utxo of a given account.
 868    """
 869    smart_contract_only=kwargs.get('smart_contract_only',True)
 870    utxo_url='http://'+MY_HOSTNAME+'/utxo/'+public_key_hash
 871    resp = requests.get(utxo_url)
 872    utxo_dict_init = resp.json()
 873    utxo_list=copy.deepcopy(utxo_dict_init['utxos'])
 874    for utxo in utxo_list:
 875        try:
 876            utxo['smart_contract_flag']
 877            if smart_contract_only is False:
 878                #we remove all the smart_contract, let's remove this value
 879                #this is used to transfer the nig out of the smart_contract
 880                utxo_dict_init['utxos'].remove(utxo)
 881        except:
 882            if smart_contract_only is True:
 883                #we keep only the smart_contract, let's remove this value
 884                utxo_dict_init['utxos'].remove(utxo)
 885    return utxo_dict_init

 978@app.route("/new_leader_node_schedule_advertisement", methods=['POST'])
 979def new_leader_node_schedule_advertisement():
 980    """
 981    save a new leader node schedule (leader node rotation).
 982    """
 983    logging.info("New leader node schedule advertisement request")
 984    content = request.json
 985    leader_node_schedule_raw = content["leader_node_schedule"]
 986    leader_node_schedule_memory = LeaderNodeScheduleMemory()
 987    try:
 988        logging.info(f"leader_node_schedule_raw {leader_node_schedule_raw}")
 989        leader_node_schedule_json = json.loads(leader_node_schedule_raw)
 990        leader_node_schedule_memory.store_new_leader_node_schedule_json(leader_node_schedule_json)
 991    except TransactionException as transaction_exception:
 992        return f'{transaction_exception}', 400
 993    return "New node advertisement success", 200
 994
 995@app.route("/restart", methods=['GET'])
 996def restart():
 997    """
 998    restart the network of nodes by completely reseting 
 999    the storage of each node known by the leader node.
1000    It can be only triggered by the leader node.
1001    """
1002    logging.info("===Network restart request")
1003    known_nodes_memory=KnownNodesMemory()
1004    known_nodes_memory.known_nodes
1005    node_list = known_nodes_memory.known_nodes
1006    new_node_list=[]
1007    for node in node_list:
1008        new_node_list.append(node)
1009
1010    logging.info(f"===new_node_list:{new_node_list}")
1011    my_node = Node(MY_HOSTNAME)
1012    #network = Network(my_node)
1013    mempool = MemPool()
1014    mempool.clear_transactions_from_memory()
1015
1016    master_state_threading.receiving_reset()
1017    master_state_readiness.release()
1018
1019    from common.consensus_blockchain import consensus_blockchain
1020    consensus_blockchain.refresh()
1021    
1022    
1023    #full reset of the network
1024    shutil.rmtree(STORAGE_DIR)
1025    os.makedirs(STORAGE_DIR)
1026    #ask all the node to rejoin the reseted network
1027    for node in new_node_list:
1028        logging.info(f"node: {node} my_node:{my_node}")
1029        if node!= my_node:
1030            node.restart_request()
1031    
1032    network.known_nodes_memory = KnownNodesMemory()
1033    network.join_network(reset_network=True)
1034    for node in new_node_list:
1035        logging.info(f"node: {node} my_node:{my_node}")
1036        if node!= my_node:
1037            node.restart_join()
1038
1039    response = app.response_class(
1040        response=json.dumps("Network Restart success"),
1041        status=200,
1042        mimetype='application/json'
1043    )
1044    return response
1045

1131@app.route("/check_notification/<user_public_key_hash>/<notification_timestamp_dict_raw>", methods=['GET'])
1132def get_check_notification(user_public_key_hash,notification_timestamp_dict_raw):
1133    """
1134    check if notifications are needed in the mobile app (interface) for a given account.
1135    """
1136    notification_timestamp_dict=json.loads(notification_timestamp_dict_raw)
1137    notification_dict={}
1138    for marketplace_step in notification_timestamp_dict.keys():
1139        marketplace_step_counter=0
1140        #logging.info(f"marketplace_step for user: {marketplace_step}")
1141        archive_flag=False
1142        archive_timestamp=False
1143        if int(marketplace_step)>=4:
1144            archive_flag=True
1145            archive_timestamp=float(notification_timestamp_dict[marketplace_step])
1146        try:
1147            blockchain_memory = BlockchainMemory()
1148            blockchain_base = blockchain_memory.get_all_blockchain_from_memory()
1149            marketplace_step_raw=blockchain_base.get_marketplace_step(marketplace_step,user_public_key_hash,archive_flag=archive_flag,archive_timestamp=archive_timestamp)['results']
1150            for elem in marketplace_step_raw:
1151                if int(elem["timestamp_nig"])>int(float(notification_timestamp_dict[marketplace_step])) and elem["readonly_flag"] is False :marketplace_step_counter+=1
1152            notification_dict[marketplace_step]=marketplace_step_counter
1153        except Exception as e:
1154            logging.info(f"exception: {e}")
1155            notification_dict[marketplace_step]=0
1156    logging.info(f"==>notification_dict:{notification_dict}")
1157    logging.info(f"check_notification for user: {user_public_key_hash} notification_timestamp:{notification_timestamp_dict}")
1158    return jsonify(notification_dict)

1188
1189def get_nig_value_projection_raw(nig_amount,range_list1,range_list2):
1190    """
1191    sub function used to calculates the NIG value in function get_nig_value_projection,
1192    function get_nig_value_projection_year and function get_nig_value_projection_future.
1193    """
1194    logging.info(f"get_nig_value")
1195    from common.values import EUR_NIG_VALUE_START_TIMESTAMP,EUR_NIG_VALUE_START_CONVERSION_RATE,EUR_NIG_VALUE_START_INCREASE_DAILY_PERCENTAGE,EUR_NIG_VALUE_START_INCREASE_HALVING_DAYS
1196    current_timestamp=datetime.timestamp(datetime.utcnow())
1197    t1=datetime.utcnow()
1198    
1199    result=[]
1200    for i in range(len(range_list1)):
1201        t2=t1+datetime_delta.timedelta(days=range_list1[i])
1202        #delta=t2-t1
1203        delta=t2-datetime.fromtimestamp(float(EUR_NIG_VALUE_START_TIMESTAMP))
1204        delta_days=delta.days
1205        flag=True
1206        nig_value=float(EUR_NIG_VALUE_START_CONVERSION_RATE)
1207        nig_increase=1
1208        INCREASE_DAILY_PERCENTAGE=float(EUR_NIG_VALUE_START_INCREASE_DAILY_PERCENTAGE)
1209        HALVING_DAYS=float(EUR_NIG_VALUE_START_INCREASE_HALVING_DAYS)
1210        while flag is True:
1211            if delta_days<HALVING_DAYS:
1212                nig_increase=nig_increase*math.pow((float(INCREASE_DAILY_PERCENTAGE)/100)+1,delta_days)
1213                nig_rate=nig_value*nig_increase
1214                nig_value=float(nig_amount)*nig_rate
1215            
1216                nig_increase_percentage=(nig_increase-1)*100
1217                nig_increase_percentage_string="{:.2f}".format(nig_increase_percentage)
1218                nig_value_string="{:.2f}".format(nig_value)
1219                nig_rate_string="{:.2f}".format(nig_rate)
1220                flag=False
1221            else:
1222                nig_increase=nig_increase*math.pow((float(INCREASE_DAILY_PERCENTAGE)/100)+1,HALVING_DAYS)
1223                delta_days-=HALVING_DAYS
1224                INCREASE_DAILY_PERCENTAGE=INCREASE_DAILY_PERCENTAGE/2
1225
1226        result.append(str(int(nig_value)))
1227
1228        logging.info(f" {range_list2[i]} => nig_value: {nig_value_string}€ increase: {nig_increase_percentage_string}% nig_rate : {nig_rate_string} NIG last increase: {INCREASE_DAILY_PERCENTAGE}")
1229    
1230    return jsonify(result)
1231
1232@app.route("/nig_rate_eur", methods=['GET'])
1233def get_nig_rate():
1234    """
1235    get the current NIG value in € for 1 NIG.
1236    """
1237    nig_rate=calculate_nig_rate(currency='eur')
1238    nig_rate_string="{:.2f}".format(nig_rate)
1239    logging.info(f" nig_rate : {nig_rate_string} € for 1 NIG")
1240    return jsonify(nig_rate)
1241
1242def calculate_nig_rate(*args, **kwargs):
1243    """
1244    calculate NIG value in € for 1 NIG based on a given timestamp.
1245    """
1246    #logging.info(f"get_nig_rate_eur")
1247    timestamp=kwargs.get('timestamp',None)
1248    currency=kwargs.get('currency','eur').upper()
1249    variable_module = __import__("common")
1250    NIG_VALUE_START_TIMESTAMP=variable_module.values.__getattribute__(currency+"_NIG_VALUE_START_TIMESTAMP")
1251    NIG_VALUE_START_CONVERSION_RATE=variable_module.values.__getattribute__(currency+"_NIG_VALUE_START_CONVERSION_RATE")
1252    NIG_VALUE_START_INCREASE_DAILY_PERCENTAGE=variable_module.values.__getattribute__(currency+"_NIG_VALUE_START_INCREASE_DAILY_PERCENTAGE")
1253    NIG_VALUE_START_INCREASE_HALVING_DAYS=variable_module.values.__getattribute__(currency+"_NIG_VALUE_START_INCREASE_HALVING_DAYS")
1254    if timestamp is not None:date_now=datetime.fromtimestamp(timestamp)
1255    else:date_now=datetime.utcnow()
1256
1257    delta=date_now-datetime.fromtimestamp(float(NIG_VALUE_START_TIMESTAMP))
1258    #delta=date_now-(datetime.utcnow()-datetime_delta.timedelta(189))
1259    delta_days=delta.days
1260    #logging.info(f" delta_days: {delta_days}")
1261    flag=True
1262    nig_rate_initial=float(NIG_VALUE_START_CONVERSION_RATE)
1263    nig_increase=1
1264    INCREASE_DAILY_PERCENTAGE=float(NIG_VALUE_START_INCREASE_DAILY_PERCENTAGE)
1265    HALVING_DAYS=float(NIG_VALUE_START_INCREASE_HALVING_DAYS)
1266    while flag is True:
1267        if delta_days<HALVING_DAYS:
1268            nig_increase=nig_increase*math.pow((float(INCREASE_DAILY_PERCENTAGE)/100)+1,delta_days)
1269            nig_rate=nig_rate_initial*nig_increase
1270            flag=False
1271        else:
1272            nig_increase=nig_increase*math.pow((float(INCREASE_DAILY_PERCENTAGE)/100)+1,HALVING_DAYS)
1273            delta_days-=HALVING_DAYS
1274            INCREASE_DAILY_PERCENTAGE=INCREASE_DAILY_PERCENTAGE/2    
1275    #logging.info(f"nig_rate: {nig_rate}")
1276    return nig_rate
1277

1309    receiver_owner=bertrand_owner
1310    sender_wallet=camille_wallet
1311    receiver_wallet=bertrand_wallet
1312    transaction_amount=2
1313
1314    #let's retrieve the utxo
1315    utxo_url='http://'+MY_HOSTNAME+'/utxo/'+sender_owner.public_key_hash
1316    resp = requests.get(utxo_url)
1317    utxo_dict = resp.json()
1318
1319    if transaction_amount>utxo_dict['total']:
1320        #transaction amount is exceeding wallet total
1321        logging.info(f"transaction amount {transaction_amount} is exceeding wallet total {utxo_dict['total']} for sender {sender_owner.public_key_hash} ")
1322    else:
1323        #wallet total is exceeding transaction amount
1324        remaing_transaction_amount=transaction_amount
1325        input_list=[]
1326        output_list=[]
1327        for utxo in utxo_dict['utxos']:
1328            if utxo['amount']>=remaing_transaction_amount:
1329                #only one utxo is sufficient
1330                input_list.append(TransactionInput(transaction_hash=utxo['transaction_hash'], output_index=utxo['output_index'],unlocking_public_key_hash=sender_owner.public_key_hash))
1331                #input_list.append(TransactionInput(transaction_hash=utxo['transaction_hash'], output_index=utxo['output_index'],unlocking_public_key_hash='sender_wallet.public_key_hash'))
1332                #check=TransactionInput(transaction_hash=utxo['transaction_hash'], output_index=utxo['output_index'],unlocking_public_key_hash='sender_wallet.public_key_hash')
1333                #logging.info(f"====check check.to_json() {check.to_json()}")
1334                
1335                
1336                output_list.append(TransactionOutput(public_key_hash=receiver_owner.public_key_hash, amount=remaing_transaction_amount,interface_public_key_hash=interface_public_key_hash,))
1337                if utxo['amount']-remaing_transaction_amount>0:
1338                    output_list.append(TransactionOutput(public_key_hash=sender_owner.public_key_hash, amount=(utxo['amount']-remaing_transaction_amount),interface_public_key_hash=interface_public_key_hash,))
1339                sender_wallet.process_transaction(inputs=input_list, outputs=output_list)
1340                break
1341            else:
1342                #more than one utxo will be needed
1343                input_list.append(TransactionInput(transaction_hash=utxo['transaction_hash'], output_index=utxo['output_index'],unlocking_public_key_hash=sender_owner.public_key_hash))
1344                #input_list.append(TransactionInput(transaction_hash=utxo['transaction_hash'], output_index=utxo['output_index'],unlocking_public_key_hash='sender_wallet.public_key_hash'))
1345                #check=TransactionInput(transaction_hash=utxo['transaction_hash'], output_index=utxo['output_index'],unlocking_public_key_hash='sender_wallet.public_key_hash')
1346                #logging.info(f"====check check.to_json() {check.to_json()}")
1347
1348                output_list.append(TransactionOutput(public_key_hash=receiver_owner.public_key_hash, amount=utxo['amount'],interface_public_key_hash=interface_public_key_hash,))
1349                
1350                remaing_transaction_amount-=utxo['amount']
1351                sender_wallet.process_transaction(inputs=input_list, outputs=output_list)
1352                input_list=[]
1353                output_list=[]
1354
1355    return "Restart success", 200

1412@app.route("/smart_contract", methods=['POST'])
1413def get_smart_contract():
1414    """
1415    add and validate a new provided payload on an existing smart contract.
1416    """
1417    content = request.json
1418    #fix for boolean
1419    content=clean_request(content)
1420    #logging.info(f"###smart_contract content:{content}")
1421    smart_contract_type=content['smart_contract_type']
1422    smart_contract_public_key_hash=content['smart_contract_public_key_hash']
1423    sender_public_key_hash=content['sender_public_key_hash']
1424    try:smart_contract_transaction_hash=content['smart_contract_transaction_hash']
1425    except:smart_contract_transaction_hash=None
1426    try:smart_contract_previous_transaction=content['smart_contract_previous_transaction']
1427    except:smart_contract_previous_transaction=None
1428    try:smart_contract_new=content['smart_contract_new']
1429    except:smart_contract_new=False
1430    payload=content['payload']
1431    
1432    smart_contract_dict={}
1433    if smart_contract_public_key_hash=="marketplace":
1434        smart_contract_public_key_hash=smart_contract_owner.public_key_hash
1435    smart_contract_previous_transaction,smart_contract_transaction_hash=load_smart_contract(smart_contract_public_key_hash)
1436    if smart_contract_transaction_hash is None:
1437        smart_contract_previous_transaction,smart_contract_transaction_hash=load_smart_contract(smart_contract_public_key_hash)
1438    logging.info(f"########### CHECK smart_contract_transaction_hash: {smart_contract_transaction_hash}")
1439    smart_contract=SmartContract(smart_contract_public_key_hash,
1440                                 smart_contract_sender=sender_public_key_hash,
1441                                 smart_contract_type=smart_contract_type,
1442                                 payload=payload,
1443                                 smart_contract_previous_transaction=smart_contract_transaction_hash,
1444                                 smart_contract_transaction_hash=smart_contract_transaction_hash,
1445                                 smart_contract_new=smart_contract_new)
1446
1447    smart_contract.process()
1448    if smart_contract.error_flag is False:
1449        smart_contract_dict['smart_contract_account']=smart_contract.smart_contract_account
1450        smart_contract_dict['smart_contract_sender']=smart_contract.smart_contract_sender
1451        smart_contract_dict['smart_contract_new']=smart_contract.smart_contract_new
1452        smart_contract_dict['smart_contract_flag']=True
1453        smart_contract_dict['smart_contract_gas']=smart_contract.gas
1454        smart_contract_dict['smart_contract_memory']=smart_contract.smart_contract_memory
1455        smart_contract_dict['smart_contract_memory_size']=smart_contract.smart_contract_memory_size
1456        smart_contract_dict['smart_contract_type']=smart_contract.smart_contract_type
1457        smart_contract_dict['smart_contract_payload']=smart_contract.payload
1458        smart_contract_dict['smart_contract_result']=smart_contract.result
1459        smart_contract_dict['smart_contract_previous_transaction']=smart_contract.smart_contract_previous_transaction
1460        smart_contract_dict['smart_contract_transaction_hash']=smart_contract.smart_contract_transaction_hash
1461    smart_contract_dict['smart_contract_error_flag']=smart_contract.error_flag
1462    smart_contract_dict['smart_contract_error_code']=str(smart_contract.error_code)
1463    return jsonify(smart_contract_dict)

1468@app.route("/blockchain_root", methods=['GET'])
1469def get_blockchain_root():
1470    """
1471    get all the available chains of blocks waiting to be validated by the nodes.
1472    """
1473    logging.info("Get Root of BlockChain")
1474    #step 2 sorting of best block
1475    from common.consensus_blockchain import consensus_blockchain
1476    final_chain_list=copy.deepcopy(consensus_blockchain.final_chain_list)
1477    logging.info(f"final_chain_list:{final_chain_list}")
1478    
1479    consensus_blockchain.backlog_chain_list
1480    logging.info(f"consensus_blockchain.backlog_chain_list:{consensus_blockchain.backlog_chain_list}")
1481    logging.info(f"final_chain_list:{final_chain_list}")
1482    for i in range(len(final_chain_list)):
1483        del final_chain_list[i]['block_header_data']['current_PoH_timestamp']
1484        del final_chain_list[i]['block_header_data']['merkle_root']
1485        del final_chain_list[i]['block_header_data']['noonce']
1486        del final_chain_list[i]['block_header_data']['previous_block_hash']
1487    if final_chain_list!=[]:
1488        final_chain_list.insert(0, "=====Best Block=====")
1489        for backlog_chain_list_counter in consensus_blockchain.backlog_chain_list.keys():
1490            final_chain_list.insert(0,consensus_blockchain.backlog_chain_list[backlog_chain_list_counter]['list'])
1491            backlog_chain_text=f"=====BlockChain List {backlog_chain_list_counter} ====="
1492            final_chain_list.insert(0,backlog_chain_text)
1493    return jsonify(final_chain_list)

1497class MarketplaceRequestArchivingProcessing:
1498    """
1499    Class to archive expired marketplace requests.
1500    """
1501    def __init__(self,*args, **kwargs):
1502        self.e = threading.Event()
1503
1504    def launch(self,request_type,marketplace_account,marketplace_step,mp_request_signature):
1505        self.PoH_threading = threading.Thread(target=self.start, args=(self.e,request_type,marketplace_account,marketplace_step,mp_request_signature))
1506        self.PoH_threading.start()
1507
1508    def start(self,e,request_type,marketplace_account,marketplace_step,mp_request_signature):
1509        while e.is_set() is False:
1510            marketplace_request_archiving(request_type=request_type,marketplace_account=marketplace_account,marketplace_step=marketplace_step,mp_request_signature=mp_request_signature)
1511            logging.info('===> marketplace_request_archiving termination')
1512            self.stop()
1513            break
1514
1515    def stop(self):
1516        self.e.set()
1517
1518def marketplace_request_archiving(*args, **kwargs):
1519    """
1520    sub function of MarketplaceRequestArchivingProcessing Class.
1521    """
1522    #Archiving of the expired marketplace request
1523    logging.info(f"###INFO marketplace_request_archiving init")
1524    marketplace_account = kwargs.get('marketplace_account',None)
1525    marketplace_step = kwargs.get('marketplace_step',0)
1526    request_type = kwargs.get('request_type',None)
1527    mp_request_signature = kwargs.get('mp_request_signature',None)
1528    
1529    user_type:None
1530    if request_type=="cancellation_by_buyer":user_type="buyer"
1531    if request_type=="cancellation_by_seller":user_type="seller"
1532    
1533    if marketplace_account is not None:
1534        logging.info(f"###INFO marketplace_request_archiving check1")
1535        #STEP 1 retrieve the needed information
1536        from common.smart_contract_script import marketplace_expiration_script,marketplace_archiving_script
1537        sender_public_key_hash=marketplace_owner.public_key_hash
1538        payload=marketplace_archiving_script
1539        smart_contract=SmartContract(marketplace_account,
1540                                    smart_contract_sender=sender_public_key_hash,
1541                                    smart_contract_type="api",
1542                                    payload=payload)
1543        smart_contract.process()
1544        logging.info(f'###INFO marketplace_request_archiving check 1 result:{smart_contract.result}')
1545        if smart_contract.result is not None and smart_contract.error_flag is False:
1546            logging.info(f"###INFO marketplace_request_archiving check2")
1547            #STEP 2 process the Marketplace SmartContract
1548            account_list_2_remove=smart_contract.result
1549            #account_list_2_remove[0]=buyer_public_key_hash
1550            #account_list_2_remove[1]=seller_public_key_hash]
1551            #removal of '' for step 1 as there is no Seller
1552            try:account_list_2_remove.remove('')
1553            except:pass
1554            marketplace_cancellation_script=f"""
1555memory_obj_2_load=['mp_request_step2_done']
1556mp_request_step2_done.check_cancellation("{mp_request_signature}","{user_type}")
1557mp_request_step2_done.validate_step()
1558memory_list.add([mp_request_step2_done,mp_request_step2_done.mp_request_name,['account','step','timestamp','requested_amount',
1559  'requested_currency','requested_deposit','buyer_public_key_hash','reputation_buyer','reputation_seller',
1560  'buyer_public_key_hex','requested_nig','timestamp_nig','seller_public_key_hex','seller_public_key_hash','encrypted_account',
1561  'mp_request_signature','mp_request_id','previous_mp_request_name','mp_request_name','seller_safety_coef','smart_contract_ref']])
1562mp_request_step2_done.get_requested_deposit()
1563"""
1564            payment_default_script=f"""
1565memory_obj_2_load=['mp_request_step2_done']
1566mp_request_step2_done.check_payment_default("{mp_request_signature}")
1567mp_request_step2_done.validate_step()
1568memory_list.add([mp_request_step2_done,mp_request_step2_done.mp_request_name,['account','step','timestamp','requested_amount',
1569  'requested_currency','requested_deposit','buyer_public_key_hash','reputation_buyer','reputation_seller',
1570  'buyer_public_key_hex','requested_nig','timestamp_nig','seller_public_key_hex','seller_public_key_hash','encrypted_account',
1571  'mp_request_signature','mp_request_id','previous_mp_request_name','mp_request_name','seller_safety_coef','smart_contract_ref']])
1572mp_request_step2_done.get_requested_deposit()
1573"""
1574
1575            
1576            archiving_step=None
1577            if request_type=="expiration":
1578                payload=marketplace_expiration_script
1579                archiving_step=98
1580            if "cancellation" in request_type:
1581                payload=marketplace_cancellation_script
1582                archiving_step=99
1583            if request_type=="payment_default":
1584                payload=payment_default_script
1585                archiving_step=66
1586
1587            smart_contract_previous_transaction,smart_contract_transaction_hash=load_smart_contract(marketplace_account)
1588            utxo_dict=get_utxo(marketplace_account)
1589            input_list=[]
1590            output_list=[]
1591            for utxo in utxo_dict['utxos']:
1592                #there is normally only one UTXO
1593                smart_contract_amount=0
1594                smart_contract=SmartContract(marketplace_account,
1595                                            smart_contract_sender=sender_public_key_hash,
1596                                            smart_contract_type="source",
1597                                            payload=payload,
1598                                            smart_contract_previous_transaction=smart_contract_transaction_hash,
1599                                            smart_contract_transaction_hash=smart_contract_transaction_hash)
1600                smart_contract.process()
1601                smart_contract.error_flag
1602                smart_contract.error_code
1603                logging.info(f"### smart_contract error_flag:{smart_contract.error_flag} smart_contract.error_code:{smart_contract.error_code}")
1604                logging.info(f"### smart_contract result:{smart_contract.result}")
1605                requested_deposit=smart_contract.result
1606                if requested_deposit is None:requested_deposit=0
1607                #STEP 2 : retrieve payment amount to buyer
1608
1609
1610                if request_type=="payment_default":
1611                    seller_safety_coef_script=f"""
1612memory_obj_2_load=['mp_request_step2_done']
1613return mp_request_step2_done.requested_nig
1614"""
1615                    smart_contract_requested_nig=SmartContract(marketplace_account,
1616                                            smart_contract_sender=sender_public_key_hash,
1617                                            smart_contract_type="source",
1618                                            payload=seller_safety_coef_script,
1619                                            smart_contract_previous_transaction=smart_contract_transaction_hash,
1620                                            smart_contract_transaction_hash=smart_contract_transaction_hash)
1621                    smart_contract_requested_nig.process()
1622                    payment_default_transaction_amount=smart_contract_requested_nig.result
1623                    logging.info(f"### payment_default_transaction_amount result:{payment_default_transaction_amount}")
1624                    #the transaction amount is recredited to the seller
1625                    #the seller is losing his deposit
1626                    #this amount is sent in the SmartContract and so lost
1627                    smart_contract_amount=(utxo['amount']-payment_default_transaction_amount)
1628
1629                        
1630                unlocking_public_key_hash=marketplace_owner.public_key_hash+" SC "+marketplace_account
1631                #trigger for removing the SmartContract from the Marketplace of the account
1632                #list_public_key_hash=[marketplace_owner.public_key_hash,marketplace_account]
1633                list_public_key_hash=[marketplace_account]
1634                for account in account_list_2_remove:
1635                    if account is not None and account not in list_public_key_hash:list_public_key_hash.append(account)
1636                input_list.append(TransactionInput(transaction_hash=utxo['transaction_hash'], output_index=utxo['output_index'],unlocking_public_key_hash=unlocking_public_key_hash))
1637                output_list.append(TransactionOutput(list_public_key_hash=list_public_key_hash, 
1638                                                        marketplace_step=archiving_step,
1639                                                        account_temp=True,
1640                                                        amount=smart_contract_amount,
1641                                                        interface_public_key_hash=interface_public_key_hash,
1642                                                        smart_contract_account=smart_contract.smart_contract_account,
1643                                                        smart_contract_sender=smart_contract.smart_contract_sender,
1644                                                        smart_contract_new=smart_contract.smart_contract_new,
1645                                                        smart_contract_flag=True,
1646                                                        smart_contract_gas=smart_contract.gas,
1647                                                        smart_contract_memory=smart_contract.smart_contract_memory,
1648                                                        smart_contract_memory_size=smart_contract.smart_contract_memory_size,
1649                                                        smart_contract_type=smart_contract.smart_contract_type,
1650                                                        smart_contract_payload=smart_contract.payload,
1651                                                        smart_contract_result=smart_contract.result,
1652                                                        smart_contract_previous_transaction=smart_contract.smart_contract_previous_transaction,
1653                                                        smart_contract_transaction_hash=smart_contract.smart_contract_transaction_hash,
1654                                                        marketplace_transaction_flag=True,
1655                                                        smart_contract_transaction_flag=False))
1656                #The buyer needs to be recreditted
1657                if requested_deposit>0:
1658                    if archiving_step!=66:
1659                        #the buyer is not credited of the deposit when there is a payment default (66)
1660                        output_list.append(TransactionOutput(list_public_key_hash=[account_list_2_remove[0]], 
1661                                                                amount=(requested_deposit)))
1662                            
1663                try:
1664                    #account_list_2_remove[1]=seller_public_key_hash
1665                    #seller_public_key_hash can be None in step 2 
1666                    account_list_2_remove[1]
1667                    seller_public_key_hash_ok=True
1668                except:
1669                    seller_public_key_hash_ok=False
1670                        
1671
1672                if marketplace_step==3 and request_type=="payment_default":
1673                    #The seller needs to be recreditted only in step 3 only in case of payment_default
1674                    #in marketplace_step 3, the seller needs to confirm the transaction so he cannot be recreditted
1675                    output_list.append(TransactionOutput(list_public_key_hash=[account_list_2_remove[1]], 
1676                                                        amount=payment_default_transaction_amount))
1677
1678                else:
1679                    if marketplace_step!=3 and seller_public_key_hash_ok is True:
1680                        #The seller needs to be recreditted only in step 2
1681                        output_list.append(TransactionOutput(list_public_key_hash=[account_list_2_remove[1]], 
1682                                                            amount=(utxo['amount']-requested_deposit)))
1683
1684                    
1685                        
1686                        
1687                marketplace_wallet.process_transaction(inputs=input_list, outputs=output_list)
1688
1689                #Refresh of the reputation
1690                #refresh_reputation(account_list_2_remove[0])
1691                #refresh_reputation(account_list_2_remove[1])
1692
1693        else:
1694            logging.info(f"**** ISSUE marketplace_request_archiving , marketplace_account: {marketplace_account} marketplace_step:{marketplace_step} request_type:{request_type}")
1695            logging.info(f"**** ISSUE: {smart_contract.error_code}")
1696

1700class BacklogScoreProcessing:
1701    """
1702    Class to manage the backlog of request for refreshing score 
1703    to avoid having more than 1 request for the same participant.
1704    """
1705    def __init__(self,*args, **kwargs):
1706        self.backlog=[]
1707
1708    def __clean_request(self):
1709        backlog=copy.deepcopy(self.backlog)
1710        for item in backlog:
1711            if (time.time()-item[1])>60:
1712                #the request is older than 60 sec
1713                #we can remove it
1714                self.backlog.remove(item)
1715                
1716    def check_request(self,participant_public_key_hash):
1717        self.__clean_request()
1718        if participant_public_key_hash in [y[0] for y in self.backlog]:return True
1719        else:
1720            self.backlog.append([participant_public_key_hash,time.time()])
1721            return False
1722       
1723
1724backlog_score_processing=BacklogScoreProcessing()
1725
1726@app.route("/participant_refresh_score/<participant_public_key_hash>", methods=['GET'])
1727def trigger_participant_refresh_score(participant_public_key_hash):
1728    """
1729    trigger the refresh of the score of a participant.
1730    """
1731    if backlog_score_processing.check_request(participant_public_key_hash) is False:
1732        participant_refresh_score_processing=ParticipantRefreshScoreProcessing()
1733        participant_refresh_score_processing.launch(participant_public_key_hash)
1734    return "Transaction success", 200

1759def participant_refresh_score(*args, **kwargs):
1760    """
1761    sub function of Class ParticipantRefreshScoreProcessing to refresh the score of a participant.
1762    """
1763    #Step 0 during 4 PoH_DURATION_SEC to ensure that the preivous block is processed
1764    logging.info(f"###INFO participant_refresh_score init")
1765    participant_public_key_hash = kwargs.get('participant_public_key_hash',None)
1766    block_creation_flag = kwargs.get('block_creation_flag',False)
1767    if block_creation_flag is False:time.sleep(PoH_DURATION_SEC*3)
1768    
1769    logging.info(f"###INFO participant_refresh_score participant_public_key_hash:{participant_public_key_hash}")
1770    #Step 1 retrieve the smart_contract associated to the participant
1771    sender_public_key_hash=marketplace_owner.public_key_hash
1772    from common.smart_contract_script import participant_retrieve_smart_contract
1773    payload=f"""
1774public_key_hash="{participant_public_key_hash}"
1775"""+participant_retrieve_smart_contract
1776    smart_contract=SmartContract(CONTEST_PUBLIC_KEY_HASH,
1777                                smart_contract_sender=sender_public_key_hash,
1778                                smart_contract_type="api",
1779                                payload=payload)
1780    smart_contract.process()
1781    participant_smart_contract_public_key_hash=smart_contract.result
1782    if participant_smart_contract_public_key_hash is not None:
1783        #Step 2 refresh the score
1784        sender_public_key_hash=marketplace_owner.public_key_hash
1785        smart_contract_previous_transaction,smart_contract_transaction_hash=load_smart_contract(participant_smart_contract_public_key_hash)
1786        utxo_dict=get_utxo(participant_smart_contract_public_key_hash)
1787        input_list=[]
1788        output_list=[]
1789        for utxo in utxo_dict['utxos']:
1790            smart_contract=SmartContract(participant_smart_contract_public_key_hash,
1791                                        smart_contract_sender=sender_public_key_hash,
1792                                        smart_contract_type="source",
1793                                        payload=participant_refresh_score_script,
1794                                        smart_contract_previous_transaction=smart_contract_transaction_hash,
1795                                        smart_contract_transaction_hash=smart_contract_transaction_hash)
1796            smart_contract.process()
1797            logging.info(f'####smart_contract.result:{smart_contract.result}')
1798            if smart_contract.error_flag is False and smart_contract.smart_contract_memory!=[]:
1799                unlocking_public_key_hash=marketplace_owner.public_key_hash+" SC "+participant_smart_contract_public_key_hash
1800                input_list.append(TransactionInput(transaction_hash=utxo['transaction_hash'], output_index=utxo['output_index'],unlocking_public_key_hash=unlocking_public_key_hash))
1801                output_list.append(TransactionOutput(list_public_key_hash=[participant_smart_contract_public_key_hash], 
1802                                                     account_temp=True,
1803                                                    amount=0,
1804                                                    interface_public_key_hash=interface_public_key_hash,
1805                                                    smart_contract_account=smart_contract.smart_contract_account,
1806                                                    smart_contract_sender=smart_contract.smart_contract_sender,
1807                                                    smart_contract_new=smart_contract.smart_contract_new,
1808                                                    smart_contract_flag=True,
1809                                                    smart_contract_gas=smart_contract.gas,
1810                                                    smart_contract_memory=smart_contract.smart_contract_memory,
1811                                                    smart_contract_memory_size=smart_contract.smart_contract_memory_size,
1812                                                    smart_contract_type=smart_contract.smart_contract_type,
1813                                                    smart_contract_payload=smart_contract.payload,
1814                                                    smart_contract_result=smart_contract.result,
1815                                                    smart_contract_previous_transaction=smart_contract.smart_contract_previous_transaction,
1816                                                    smart_contract_transaction_hash=smart_contract.smart_contract_transaction_hash,
1817                                                    marketplace_transaction_flag=False,
1818                                                    smart_contract_transaction_flag=True))
1819
1820                if block_creation_flag is True:
1821                    transaction_refresh_score = TransactionInBlock(input_list, output_list)
1822                    transaction_refresh_score.sign(marketplace_owner)
1823                    return transaction_refresh_score
1824                    break
1825                else:
1826                    marketplace_wallet.process_transaction(inputs=input_list, outputs=output_list)
1827                break
1828
1829    return None

1859class RefreshReputationProcessing:
1860    """
1861    Class to process all the request to refresh the reputation of participant 
1862    in parallel to avoid overloading triggered by function trigger_refresh_reputation.
1863    """
1864    def __init__(self,*args, **kwargs):
1865        self.e = threading.Event()
1866
1867    def launch(self,account_public_key_hash):
1868        self.PoH_threading = threading.Thread(target=self.start, args=(self.e,account_public_key_hash))
1869        self.PoH_threading.start()
1870
1871    def start(self,e,account_public_key_hash):
1872        while e.is_set() is False:
1873            refresh_reputation(account_public_key_hash=account_public_key_hash)
1874            logging.info('===> refresh_reputation_processing termination')
1875            self.stop()
1876            break
1877
1878    def stop(self):
1879        self.e.set()

1881
1882def refresh_reputation(*args, **kwargs):
1883    """
1884    sub function of RefreshReputationProcessing Class.
1885    """
1886    #Step 0 during 4 PoH_DURATION_SEC to ensure that the preivous block is processed
1887    logging.info(f"###INFO refresh_reputation init")
1888    #time.sleep(PoH_DURATION_SEC*3)
1889    account_public_key_hash = kwargs.get('account_public_key_hash',None)
1890    #Flag use to create reputation transaction to be inserted directly in the block at creation
1891    block_creation_flag = kwargs.get('block_creation_flag',False)
1892    logging.info(f"###INFO refresh_reputation account_public_key_hash:{account_public_key_hash}")
1893    
1894    if account_public_key_hash is not None and account_public_key_hash!="":
1895        #Step 1 retrieve all the Marketplace Archive associated to the account
1896        blockchain_memory = BlockchainMemory()
1897        blockchain_base = blockchain_memory.get_blockchain_from_memory()
1898        account_public_key_hash_utxo=blockchain_base.get_smart_contract_api(account_public_key_hash)
1899        nb_transaction=0
1900        nb_pos=0
1901        nb_neg=0
1902        for marketplace_request_account in account_public_key_hash_utxo["marketplace_archive"]:
1903            payload=f"""
1904memory_obj_2_load=['mp_request_step2_done']
1905mp_request_step2_done.get_reputation()
1906"""
1907            smart_contract=SmartContract(marketplace_request_account,
1908                                        smart_contract_sender="sender_public_key_hash",
1909                                        smart_contract_type="api",
1910                                        payload=payload)
1911            smart_contract.process()
1912
1913            reputation_dict=smart_contract.result
1914            logging.info(f"==>reputation_dict:{reputation_dict}")
1915            if reputation_dict is not None:
1916                #reputation_dict = None if step != 4  or step !=99 (expiration)
1917                for account in reputation_dict.keys():
1918                    if account==account_public_key_hash:
1919                        nb_transaction+=1
1920                        if reputation_dict[account]<0:nb_neg+=-reputation_dict[account]
1921                        if reputation_dict[account]>0:nb_pos+=reputation_dict[account]
1922
1923        logging.info(f'==>nb_transaction:{nb_transaction}')
1924        logging.info(f'==>nb_neg:{nb_neg}')
1925        logging.info(f'==>nb_pos:{nb_pos}')
1926        #Step 2 refresh the reputation SmartContrat
1927        if nb_transaction>0:
1928            reputation_smart_contrat_public_key_hash=account_public_key_hash_utxo["reputation"]
1929            if reputation_smart_contrat_public_key_hash!="" and reputation_smart_contrat_public_key_hash!=[]:
1930                sender_public_key_hash=marketplace_owner.public_key_hash

122def check_for_maintenance():
123    """
124    decorator to manage the maintenance mode trigger by function maintenance_on() and maintenance_off().
125    """

162    """
163    receive a transaction by non leader node and routes it to leader node.
164    """
165    logging.info("New transaction validation request")

201    """

203        self.e = threading.Event()
204

206        self.PoH_threading = threading.Thread(target=self.start, args=(self.e,transaction_data,new_transaction_flag))

211        new_public_key_hash=Owner().public_key_hash
212        while e.is_set() is False:
213            Process_transaction(transaction_data=transaction_data,new_transaction_flag=new_transaction_flag,new_public_key_hash=new_public_key_hash)
214            logging.info('===> TransactionMultiProcessing termination')
215            self.stop()
216            break

223def Process_transaction(*args, **kwargs):
224    """

247    else:leader_node_flag=False

278                transaction = Transaction(blockchain_base, MY_HOSTNAME)

285                        #let's wait until MasterState is release by another thread

300                    if transaction.is_valid is True and transaction.is_smart_contract_valid is True:
301                        
302                        #storing in a temporay master state
303                        master_state_temp=MasterState(temporary_save_flag=True)
304                        if check_marketplace_step1_buy(transaction.outputs,check_user_flag=False) is True:
305                            #this is a marketplace step 1, meaning a buy request, let's add a carriage transaction to increase performance
306                            add_carriage_transaction("buy",transaction,new_public_key_hash,blockchain_base,master_state_temp)
307
308                        if check_marketplace_step1_sell(transaction.outputs,check_user_flag=False) is True:
309                            #this is a marketplace step -1,meaning a sell request, let's add a carriage transaction to increase performance
310                            add_carriage_transaction("sell",transaction,new_public_key_hash,blockchain_base,master_state_temp)
311    
312                        if check_marketplace_raw(transaction.outputs,15) is True or check_marketplace_raw(transaction.outputs,2) is True or check_marketplace_raw(transaction.outputs,98) is True or check_marketplace_raw(transaction.outputs,99) is True:
313                            #the carriage transaction needs to be deleted
314                            logging.info("###INFO CARRIAGE cancellation request")
315                            delete_carriage_transaction(transaction,blockchain_base,master_state_temp)
316                            
317                        #update of transaction_data as smart_contract_previous_transaction has changed
318                        transaction.transaction_data["outputs"]=transaction.outputs
319                        transaction.transaction_data["inputs"]=transaction.inputs
320                        logging.info(f"==>block_PoH:TempBlockPoH")
321                        try:
322                            master_state_temp.update_master_state(transaction.transaction_data,"TempBlockPoH",leader_node_flag=leader_node_flag,NIGthreading_flag=True)
323                            master_state_temp.store_master_state_in_memory("TempBlockPoH")
324                        except Exception as e:
325                            #issue with the SmartContract
326                            transaction.is_smart_contract_valid=False
327                            logging.info(f"ERROR with update_master_state of SmartContract  Exception: {e}")
328                            logging.exception(e)
329
330                    if transaction.is_smart_contract_valid is True:
331                        logging.info("###INFO transaction in memory")
332                        data=transaction.transaction_data["outputs"]
333                        logging.info(f"###INFO transaction:{data}")
334                        transaction.store()
335                        transaction.add_to_PoH(PoH_memory)
336            
337                        logging.info(f"PoH_memory: {PoH_memory.registry_input_data}")
338
339                    #let's release MasterState
340                    master_state_readiness.release()
341                    #logging.info(f"###Transaction is released: {transaction.transaction_data}")
342      
343            except TransactionException as transaction_exception:
344                return f'{transaction_exception}', 400
